name: Fadoodle
description:
Welcome to Fadoodle! 

You venture out into the world to go on dates. 
But, you have to avoid the shadows of your insecurity to get to them. 
Successfully go on 3 dates to win!

Space bar to attack. WASD or arrow keys to move. 

This game was a 3 person group final project!

Credits:

Story, Dating Sim Character Art, UI Design & Music: Nolan Sadowski

Sprites & World Design: Stephen Naraine

Programming: Jason Peterson
